definitions.explanation_en: A common Japanese surname, derived from the words 'ta' (field) and 'naka' (middle), literally meaning 'middle of the field'. It is one of the most frequent family names in Japan.
definitions.explanation_cn: 一个常见的日本姓氏，源自 'ta'（田）和 'naka'（中），字面意思是‘田地中央’。它是日本最普遍的姓氏之一。
definitions.example_en: Mr. Tanaka is our new mathematics teacher.
definitions.example_cn: 田中先生是我们新来的数学老师。
